✔ Develop expertise that differentiates you

scoringOptions.text: Growing externally, but internally I feel stagnant.
scoringOptions.depiction: The world sees progress, but internally you know you're not evolving fast enough.

 ✓ No deeper meaning in the achievement

This creates a silent frustration:

"Everyone thinks I'm doing great —

The risk here isn't failure —

Monetizable Career Leverage

Your strengths are still valuable, and can be amplified into:
✔ Authority in your preferred skill areas
✔ More meaningful responsibilities

✔ High-visibility roles aligned to who you're becoming

scoringOptions.text: I'm plateauing — growth feels slower than it should.

This leads to a quiet internal question:

"Is this all there is for me here?"

Your effort is still high…
but the reward, the stretch, the thrill — is missing.

A plateau is not the end.

It's the best moment to re-shape your career:
✔ Step into higher-complexity roles
✔ Expand your income through expertise positioning
✔ Turn specialization into influence
✔ Lead initiatives instead of executing them

scoringOptions.text: My trajectory is unclear — I'm still finding the path.
